testcase.name: should display all product data when all columns are visible
should display only chosen columns for a given product (scenario: COLUMNS-ALL, product: Beef - Tongue, Fresh)
should display only chosen columns for a given product (scenario: COLUMNS-ALL-BUT-ID, product: Beef - Tongue, Fresh)
should display only chosen columns for a given product (scenario: COLUMNS-ONLY-ID, product: Beef - Tongue, Fresh)
should display only chosen columns for a given product (scenario: COLUMNS-NONE, product: Beef - Tongue, Fresh)
should invoke the onPriceInputChange callback after "price from" input value changed
should invoke the onPriceInputChange callback after "price to" input value changed
should display the "price from" in input according to passed props
should display the "price to" in input according to passed props
should invoke the onCheckboxClick callback after "name" checkbox was clicked
should display (un)checked column checkboxes after initial render
should display label including number of items
should display product row cells
should display all columns by default
should display 2 products after filtering price between 10 and 100 (correct)
should display 6 products after filtering price between 100 and 1000 (correct)
should display 0 products after filtering price between 100 and 100 (correct)
should display 1 products after filtering price between 3 and 3 (correct)
should display 3 products after filtering price between 0 and 2 (correct (partial filter))
should display 2 products after filtering price between 900 and 0 (correct (partial filter))
should display 30 products after filtering price between 0 and 0 (correct (partial filter))
should display 0 products after filtering price between 1000 and 100 (incorrect (from > to))
should display 0 products after filtering price between 0 and 0 (incorrect (price=0))
